name: myanmar-dictionary-extension
description: Myanmar Dictionary Extension for Chrome and Firefox

scripts.copy:chrome: cp -r extension/src/* node_modules source dist/chrome-extension/ && cp extension/manifests/manifestchrome.json dist/chrome-extension/manifest.json
scripts.copy:firefox: cp -r extension/src/* node_modules source dist/firefox-extension/ && cp extension/manifests/manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox-extension/manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run copy:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run copy:firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run copy:chrome && npm run copy:firefox
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && echo 'âœ… Build completed!'
